scene_description_enriched: An elderly, bearded figure, identified as God, stands on a green, grassy landscape dotted with small flowers. He is depicted with a golden halo and rays of light emanating from above, suggesting divine presence. He wears a pink robe over a golden tunic and points with his right hand towards a swirling, cloud-like orb. A scroll unfurls from beneath his left arm, bearing Latin inscriptions: "et terra" (and earth) and "fiat lux" (let there be light). The background is a deep blue, adorned with golden stars, representing the cosmos.
scene_interpretation: The Creation of Light and Earth
